remarks: Part 10 in [Baer] p. 48 line 33, (Ft)* = G(tS) in their notation (S = sigma).  (Contributed by NM, 17-May-2015.)
statement:
hdmap10.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
hdmap10.u $e |- U = ( ( DVecH ` K ) ` W ) $.
hdmap10.v $e |- V = ( Base ` U ) $.
hdmap10.n $e |- N = ( LSpan ` U ) $.
hdmap10.c $e |- C = ( ( LCDual ` K ) ` W ) $.
hdmap10.l $e |- L = ( LSpan ` C ) $.
hdmap10.m $e |- M = ( ( mapd ` K ) ` W ) $.
hdmap10.s $e |- S = ( ( HDMap ` K ) ` W ) $.
hdmap10.k $e |- ( ph -> ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) ) $.
hdmap10.t $e |- ( ph -> T e. V ) $.
hdmap10 $p |- ( ph -> ( M ` ( N ` { T } ) ) = ( L ` { ( S ` T ) } ) ) $.
